rules.comment: This example shows how to create a permission that can be used to retrieve (in encrypted or decrypted) form, the records tagged as 'PII' within the Product1 container in the SaaS-Applications workspace. Once this permissions is created, it needs to be assigned to a role and then the role granted to dtijerina-recordretriever@privcloud.com or the application app-integration-recordretriever.
